metadata.name: Potential SMB Relay Attack Tool Execution
metadata.comment: Detects different hacktools used for relay attacks on Windows for privilege escalation

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (contains(lower(process.name), lower('petitpotam')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('rottenpotato')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('hotpotato')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('juicypotato')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\just_dce_')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('juicy potato')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\temp\\\\rot.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\potato.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\spoolsample.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\responder.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\smbrelayx')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\ntlmrelayx')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\localpotato')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('invoke-tater')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' smbrelay')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ntlmrelay')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cme smb ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /ntlm:ntlmhash ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('invoke-petitpotam')) OR lower(process.cmd_line) regexp '.*\\.exe -t .* -p .*' OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe -c "{')) AND endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('}" -z'))) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.name), lower('hotpotatoes6')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('hotpotatoes7')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('hotpotatoes '))))

output.summary: Detects different hacktools used for relay attacks on Windows for privilege escalation
